threads: The real healthcare crisis isn't the cost, it's the government interference. Free market solutions, not price controls or single-payer systems, will bring affordability and quality care to all.
text: Ah, the old "government is bad" tune. Well, I'm juggling jobs and kids here, can't see this free market fairy tale helping us regular folks. Healthcare isn't a luxury car; we can't just shop around while our kids are sick. Where's the proof this works for families, not just profits?
